code: import React from'react';import{toast}from'react-toastify';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var UserRow=function UserRow(_ref){var user=_ref.user,refetch=_ref.refetch,index=_ref.index;var role=user.role,email=user.email;var makeAdmin=function makeAdmin(){var url="http://localhost:5000/users/admin/".concat(email);fetch(url,{method:'PUT',headers:{'authorization':"user ".concat(localStorage.getItem('accessToken'))}}).then(function(res){if(res.status===403){toast.error('Failed to Make an admin');}return res.json();}).then(function(data){if(data.modifiedCount>0){refetch();toast.success("Successfully made an admin");}});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:index+1}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:email}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:role!=='admin'?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:makeAdmin,className:"rounded-xl btn-xs",children:"Make Admin"}):'This person is an admin'}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"rounded-xl btn-xs",children:"Remove User"})})]});};export default UserRow;
